subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage limits on GPT-4o that reset every few hours (e.g., 80 messages every 3 hours).
Higher usage limits that reset every 8 hours (e.g., ~5x the free tier).

pricing_analysis.trend: Intensifying price competition leading to significantly lower token costs for newer, more powerful models. Subscription models are adopting usage caps instead of unlimited access, blending pay-per-use and subscription models. The focus is on delivering higher capability at a lower cost-per-token.
